Resistant varieties: Plant scab-resistant apple varieties if possible.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust: Remove nearby junipers: If practical, remove juniper trees within a few hundred feet of apple trees.

Pruning: Prune out galls on juniper trees before they produce spores.
